response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value and utility to you, we believe it's worth $15,000. However, to make this deal more attractive, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $14,000. This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know if you're interested in securing this exceptional product at this exclusive rate.", "product_price": 14000}
